title: Nice staff, nice comfortable hotel, very good location and connectivity
text:
This is a convenient hotel if you are keen to have Indian Food only...then a visit to Passage Brady ( I have done a separate review of a Pondicherry Restaurant) which is 2 streets away from this Hotel. Apart from that some rooms in this Hotel are very small and none have any cupboards...so Ok for short stays...Coffee machine is very helpful in the room with refills everyday....Very close to Starsbourg--Saint-Denis Metro.. and good connectivity to most attractions in Paris by Metro or Bus...Do but a 2-3 days bus pass since there is lot of travelling by these modes to be done.
Room Tip: Try to get rooms away from the street ...since it can be quite noisy in the night See more room tips
